thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Spotify Disrupted the Music World, Now It’s Doing the Same to Wall Street

author: Maureen Farrell
title: Spotify Disrupted the Music World, Now It’s Doing the Same to Wall Street
text:
Spotify AB upended the world of music with its popular streaming service. Now it is threatening to do the same to Wall Street.
Banks working on Spotify’s unusual public share listing stand to collect a fraction of the fees underwriters typically charge in big IPOs, in a blow to the already beleaguered stock-selling business.
